column2: "Amazing... ARKS will be undaunted even when fighting such a large hostile."
"My brother said he's giving it his all every day by mail."
"Ah, didn't he say that? He's on another ship for his ARKS work."
"I'm lonely since I can't see him... But, I'm striving to become an ARKS so that we can work together someday."
"So I've got to work harder and become a full-fledged ARKS quicker. I look forward to working with you again."
